website_summaries.verdict: The Panasonic Lumix DMC-ZS100 has a longer zoom than any other pocketable 1-inch sensor camera, but the lens doesn't live up to its potential.
cons: Lens disappoints at telephoto focal lengths

customer_reviews.title: ... a little bit bigger then this camera would be perfect. 4K not interested wanted a travel stills camera
customer_reviews.text: if the view finder was just a little bit bigger then this camera would be perfect. 4K not interested wanted a travel stills camera, this fit the bill and gives me a rest from the weight of the Nikon 810. I am a 'Manual ' Camera freak much to my surprise with a little supervision the automatics are very usable.. Oh what a surprize Zebra for stills, allows you to nail the exposure easily. Raw and jpg, so good thinking of just using jpg's as the camera output for its size and specification is second to none.
customer_reviews.author: longwire

customer_reviews.title: Wow big ups for this little camera!
customer_reviews.text: I can't really comment on full manual mode as I'm still finding my feet with this camera, but wow you don't really need too, the presets are fantastic, I am truly stunned by what this little camera can do, its rock solid which puts it on the heavy side for a compact, but its no ordinary compact, its more like a DSLR for your pocket, very robust, stunning 4k video and even more stunning low light performance, its actually way better then I thought possible for a compact. I'm thrilled with it can you tell.
customer_reviews.author: wozza

customer_reviews.title: Very dissapointed - bad picture quality
customer_reviews.text: Very, very dissappointed with this camera. Controls are non-intuitive, the body is so small you keep pushing buttons you never wanted to, panorama shots are a disaster. But all those pale beside the fact that the picture quality is plain and simple - BAD. My wife's smartphone, which came at 1/3rd of the price takes much clearer, sharper, more colour-depth pictures. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: dyzs

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Picture Quality and Features
customer_reviews.text: Have bought and still own numerous Cameras I have purchased over the last 10 years and this is now one of my favourites. its is a remarkable camera due to its picture quality, features and compact dimensions. I highly recommend this camera the 1inch sensor makes a significant difference to picture quality and combined with a 10 x optical Zoom it is incredibly versatile. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A camera that has a viewfinder
customer_reviews.text: The viewfinder is a great asset, as is the fairly extensive zoom range for a compact camera. Pictures are great in bright conditions but not quite so good in dull light. The camera has a large choice of functions, can be used manually and is easy to operate with a touch screen. Certainly to be recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Katharine Jeans

customer_reviews.title: Superb compact with 1 ins sensor
customer_reviews.text: I own many cameras and this is the best value 1 ins sensor around.
customer_reviews.author: george maddison

customer_reviews.title: Excellent every day camera
customer_reviews.text: Takes very nice photos, some excellent effects once you've learnt how to use it. But, just as good if you want to point and shoot.
customer_reviews.author: MR D BAKER

customer_reviews.title: Quality images
customer_reviews.text: As I use a wheelchair I wanted a camera that I could use without carrying all the equipment for my DSLR this fits the bill.
customer_reviews.author: J. W. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Perfect camera for your pocket
customer_reviews.text: Superb pocketable camera to carry around. The image quality is great due to the larger than normal sensor size and all modes, including manual are supported.
customer_reviews.author: Sam T.

customer_reviews.title: Lovely camera but about 6 different sets of instructions none ...
customer_reviews.text: Lovely camera but about 6 different sets of instructions none of them in English which seems strange from a company based in England providing a customer in England
customer_reviews.author: Frances

customer_reviews.title: Annoting
customer_reviews.text: All that money and no cable to connect to the laptop..
customer_reviews.author: Redsookycat

customer_reviews.title: brilliant camera
customer_reviews.text: Pleased I bought this camera, using larger sensor makes a big difference to photo quality, wish I had bought one before
customer_reviews.author: S O

customer_reviews.title: Excellent camera
customer_reviews.text: An excellent camera. I especially like the ability to save stills from 4k video footage and select the focal point after having taken the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Ian B

customer_reviews.title: Overall picture quality excellent
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding camera, compact sophisticated and lightweight, ideal for travelling. I use it for my Exhibition Artworks.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Marshall

customer_reviews.title: It’s alright
customer_reviews.text: Just not as good as my g7x so sold this and bought a g7x Mark 3
customer_reviews.author: Georgina Hill-Brown

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Bit disappointing, bought it to replace previous panasonic. Can't see any noticeable improvements in picture quality despite larger sensor and have sacrified 20x zoom.
customer_reviews.author: Paul davis

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant camera
customer_reviews.text: Love this camera only had it a few days took 150 pictures
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality camera. very good pictures from a camera which has some extremely good features in a comprehensive 'scene' selection for automatic shots. The one for shooting moving things like animals, is very clever! The touch screen is very clear and responsive and easy to use. I particularly like the way the screen shut off if you put your eye to the viewfinder for shots in bright sunlight. Although this camera is near the top of the price range for compacts, it features match the quality of my Canon 7D without the tremendous weight! This is a pocket camera with picture power of an SLR
customer_reviews.author: Mark Bond

customer_reviews.title: Great family camera
customer_reviews.text: Had this camera for six months now and love it. Picture quality is excellent and has enough control and features that I no longer take my SLR out. So much easier with small kids to handling this. Pictures and videos do take a lot of space, so buy a big card.
customer_reviews.author: From Wiltshire

customer_reviews.title: DISAPPOINTING IMAGE QUALITY FROM A WEL- MADE COMPACT CAMERA
customer_reviews.text: Sadly the performance of the built in long zoom lens is rather soft. Too much image quality has been sacrificed to get a huge zoom range. Beautifully built and user friendly handling though. Fine if just for 'Happy Snaps!' Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Robin of Sherwood

customer_reviews.title: Excellent deal through Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Excellent deal through Amazon. This was a full UK model (EB) so no worries about a Grey Import. The promotion of the free Panasonic case and battery was something really worth having. If you purchase this then also look at the Lemix (BLE9) Ultra Slim USB Charger for Panasonic DMW-BLE9, DMW-BLG10 & DMW-BLH7E Batteries, as this will allow you to charge the battery out of the camera which is important when having a second battery.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Kemp

customer_reviews.title: it looks beautiful and it works like a dream
customer_reviews.text: It arrived well before the scheduled delivery date, it looks beautiful and it works like a dream. I do actually love it!
customer_reviews.author: Mystery Customer

customer_reviews.title: A good all round compact camera
customer_reviews.text: This a replacement for one I damaged falling over . Focus sometimes is tricky with a busy background but otherwise fine .A good size to have in your pocket macro very good . It is light; even with a steel body. It has all the features I want and more. I don't like the Silkypix editing software but of course there are other ones you can use.If you want a longer zoom you might want the TZ200
customer_reviews.author: Susan Cripps

customer_reviews.title: Best Camera I have owned in many a year
customer_reviews.text: Love this camera. Light and easy to carry in a pocket - small but ram packed with amazing features. Th ephtots I have taken have impressed all who have seen them - even those who were convinced their Apple I Phone's camera was the bees knees. This is a wonderful canera worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Keith Bradbury

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera even though quite pricey
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this. It's perfect for me. I love the quality of the pictures. I really only use the auto focus + as this setting recognises closeup pics as well as landscape, but plenty of other settings if you are more experienced. I didn't want a large camera but wanted a better camera than my phone. This is perfect. So easy to use. Its touch screen.Has it's own app. You can control the camera with your phone which is great as I don't need a pc or laptop to upload the photos on to. I highly recommend this camera its a very advanced point and shoot with lots of manual settings if required.
customer_reviews.author: Mintulip

product_meta.title: Panasonic LUMIX DMC-TZ100EBS Digital Travel Camera - Black
product_meta.description:
Colour Name:BlackThe Panasonic TZ100 has been designed with power and function in ideal balance with sharp ultra-bright LEICA zoom lens in a stylish and compact pocket-sized shape. Featuring the powerful 1-inch 20-megapixel MOS sensor, the small and light weight camera provides more detail, colour and clarity even in low light conditions. Just because the sun goes down, doesnot mean your camera has to be as well. The powerful 10x optical zoom gets that stunning picture both near and far making it perfect for travel and wildlife photography.The portable TZ100 camera features 4K technology for both video and photographs to record your adventure in up to 4x the quality of full HD; giving you more excitement, detail and vivid unmissable memories.The wi-fi camera allows you to easily transfer photos to your device wirelessly so that they can quickly be shared even without access to a computer.

BOX CONTAINS


Battery Pack
AC Adaptor
USB Cable
Hand Strap
Strap Holder
feature_bullets: TZ100's 1 Inch 20.1 MP MOS sensor captures more photographic detail, combined with the image stabiliser to level out handshake, taking photos with delightful colour and clarity into the night
No bulky bags or heavy equipment. This super compact and leightweight camera combines both power and portability, weighting just 310 g with both battery and memory card.
The TZ100 packs 4K functions including 4K Video and 4k Photo. Shoot 4K Video at 25fps to give your adventures even more detail and pop-out clarity

Wi-Fi camera. The built-in Wi-Fi enables to connect to smart phone or tablet wirelessly. Select the images and transfer them to device. Once the transfer is complete, the images in device's camera roll
The 4K Photo function gives you 30 fps for you to select the perfect moment after shooting
The 10x optical zoom lens allows to capture that close-up photo from a distance. The ultra-bright LEICA DC VARIO-ELMARIT zoom lens offers incredible flexibility ranging from 25 mm - 250 mm

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars113 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
